items.title: magique 0.5.0
items.summary: Magique 0.5.0 is a message transfer package designed for AI agents and distributed computing, enabling seamless communication between different nodes. This innovation aims to streamline the operation of AI systems and enhance efficiency in decentralized computing environments.

items.summary: Air India 171 crash is one of the deadliest aviation incidents in recent history with 260 casualties and only one surviving passenger, and the investigation into the crash is proving to be frustratingly opaque.

items.title: Officials say Lancaster city data center won't affect water, electrical grid
items.summary: Officials say Lancaster city data center won't affect water, electrical grid - Work on a 450,000 square-foot data center inside part of a vacant printing plant on Greenfield Road in Lancaster city is already underway and expected to be completed by summer 2027.

items.summary: Amazon Ring, under founder Jamie Siminoff, is reemphasizing a surveillance-first-privacy-last approach, leading to concerns about techno-authoritarianism and mass surveillance.
